metadata.title: Amb. Sadiq Khan in Afghanistan to discuss bilateral ties: FO Spox

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, March 22 (APP): Special Representative for Afghanistan Ambassador Muhammad Sadiq Khan is undertaking an official visit to Afghanistan from 21-23 March to discuss Pakistan-Afghanistan bilateral relations. He is undertaking the visit at the direction of Deputy Prime Minister / Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release on Saturday.
